short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Sequi you can create and automate your sales sequences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sequi is a powerful Social automation tool with different sequences and variations to engage your leads.

Reach out prospects via Social networks sequences:

路 Import leads from Social or Sales Navigator, CSV or CRM
路 Create sequences with several touches
路 Send Emails, In-Mail, Invite

Works in a cloud.
Dashboard with account and team results.
Connect several Social and email accounts for one seat.
Native Hubspot integration.

Best price on a market and the best product for B2B Lead Generation.

Sequi is very easy to use. It's the perfect tool for finding leads, candidates on LinkedIn and via email. No technical knowledge is required. 
Get started in less than 20 minutes. 
Try it for free right now.
